website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty travel case that will keep your golf-clubs protected, but its large size makes it less than ideal when space is an issue.
pros: Padded interior with extra foam near the top to protect club heads
4 multi-directional wheels, so it can stand on its own
cons: This is a large case and it may not fit easily in the back of a car

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying your clubs safely, but very big to transport.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. However, don’t over fill as handling it at the airport becomes quite tricky. Slung across an airport trolley makes getting through the doors awkward. On way to our destination we pushed them along sideways with our suitcase. On the return journey we put our dirty washing in one as there was so much room. This wasn’t a good idea as it made the case very unstable, and more difficult to manoeuvre. The Uber driver had difficulty fitting them and our suitcases into his big SUV. Managed it in the end though. All told we are happy with them, but the soft bodied, smaller cases are definitely easier to handle,
customer_reviews.author: Jan from Wales

customer_reviews.title: Good case, but some small but critical design flaws
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case, however, on my 2nd trip with it one of the screws holding the top handle came out. I called Samsonite to see about getting a warranty replacement, but it got complicated and was going to cost too much to send it back. I fixed the problem myself by buying a screw, washer, and locking nut. It's not as pretty as their design, but much more reliable and effective. Maybe I received a bad case, but I believe the other fasteners will fail in the future, so I bought additional parts to fix on failure.
customer_reviews.author: Carrol

customer_reviews.title: A great piece of MUST HAVE luggage...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing - but beware - it's big - it was wider than the back seat of a few rental cars (i think i had an impala and it just fit) What i like to do is add my clothing around the clubs - it prevents them from moving around & for a weekend get away - i don't have to bring anything but a small carry on backpack. it maneuvers very well with 4 wheels that go in any direction - you can also carry it like a hand-truck.
customer_reviews.author: jon from jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great photographer's gear case.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for hauling photography gear including, stands, umbrellas, softboxes, octabanks, reflectors, and tripods (all at once). It's extremely durable and just about anything in a photographer's kit will fit inside this except for a roll of seamless. The best investment I've made to make hauling gear to locations so much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Be wary
customer_reviews.text: Used this case once and the top handle broke. I called Samsonite and they said they would not cover under warranty. It cost me $40 to have the handle fixed. When speaking with the luggage repair person, he said this is not a true Samsonite product, its a licensed product. Samsonite does not make this.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Samsonite failed here. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Only used TWO times! Just got back from Orlando, 3/2/15, and the bottom of one corner of the case had completely collapsed & was even torn apart when we picked bag up from airport luggage. Samsonite knows Airlines & Airports take no responsibility for damaged luggage. This piece was not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Dad1964

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bad just over one year ago and now it is totally useless. The first internal strap broke within 7 months, the second snapped within a year. These are the straps that keep your golf bag from flopping around inside the case. Even the outside of the case did not hold up well (the plastic lining around the zipper has been pulled away) and I have only used the case for 6-7 golf trips during this time. I know airlines are tough on bags but when you purchase a Samsonite product and pay what I did, I expected it to last for years. Very disappointed in this product and I would not recommend anyone purchasing this travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Gorka

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I travel a lot and it is the easiest golf bag to transport. I was worried about the wheels and I have been on 3 trips and they have lasted. I like the fact that it stands up and you can push it instead of dragging it like other golf bags. It is a semi-hard case but I think the quality is Samsonite standard - it is holding up to my travel schedule.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Broke again even after repair
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wife as I have the same case in silver. Broke in April on 2019, purchased in March of 2018, only used 2 times as wife doesn't travel as much to golf. Unit was repair in April (one wheel used to pull bag broke) with note stating fix this time will not be fixed again. The 2 wheels you use for pulling the case across carpet broke on the first flight after repair. This is unacceptable and I would not recommend the case in black, maybe the silver is build better as my bag is 3 years old and no problems
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Hard case, but has a major split in side
customer_reviews.text: This case split on the first direct flight (only 1 way) it was taken on. Contacting manufacturer to see what type of replacement they will offer. Too expensive for only 1 use
customer_reviews.author: Gina Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Big club body guard
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate golf club protector. But it’s big and cumbersome. On smooth surfaces the luggage wheels work well. On pavement and cobblestone parking walkways not so good. I’m told baggage handlers refer to product as coffins. I traveled to Europe and back clubs never shifted. Plenty of extra room for rain gear and shoes. If you have to bring your clubs like I did this case did a great job protecting them. But it’s a big bag protector you will be lugging along.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST quality case I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've been through about a dozen golf travel cases. This one is rock solid and awesome. It has been on many, many trips and is holding up great. It's easy to open and holds a lot of stuff. I love that it has the four wheels for upright rolling and slanted rolling. My only issue I've had is getting it into a smaller rental car. It takes up a LOT of space, so rent bigger cars.
customer_reviews.author: James M McGill

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: The case is fine, and it does protect my clubs. I have used it several times and have not experienced any airline abuse. However, be aware that the case is huge and inflexible, and you may have a hard time fitting it into a trunk or even the back of a mid-size SUV. Going to look for a softshell carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. We recently used it on a flight to Florida and it exceeded our expectations. It kept his clubs safe and secure, and there was room in the case for his shoes and hats as well. The case is on the surprisingly light. If you are on the shorter side it is a little difficult to maneuver, but the wheels allow it to be pushed with the bag standing up. If you are looking for a travel case
customer_reviews.author: AB330

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase of this style
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can roll it upright in line at check-in versus pulling it behind me taking up space and such in line. First one lasted almost 20yrs before one of the wheels crucial to rolling upright got busted on a flight. I like the hardside versus my buddies half hard or no hard components in their travel cases. The upright rolling ability is probably my favorite feature. I laugh at my buddies dragging theirs and taking up space and excusing themselves as they drag their cases along.
customer_reviews.author: C. T. Edgett

customer_reviews.title: Samsonite Hard Side Golf Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: Although this item is intended to ship your prized golf set; we use it to ship our conference booths with marketing swag, brochures and many other items pertinent to our trade show, conferences, symposiums etc. The first time we purchased this item was 6-years ago and the overall performance is outstanding. We all know how shipping companies are so careful with our merchandise and how gingerly they handle fragile items during transit (sarcasm); this case held up above my expectations. We just recently purchased a new one simply because the last one was left behind at a conference - lucky person who claimed it. We would highly recommend this travel case.
customer_reviews.author: JJR - Chicago

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in this product overall
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product overall. I have only had it for less than 6 months and after 4 times of use it has a large crack running vertically down the side. I tried to go to Samsonite website and there was no option to get it replaced as it should not have cracked with so minimal of use. Highly recommend finding another one in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kosmann

customer_reviews.title: Strap pulled off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband as a gift. It's a very long case. We had to but the back seats down in our mid size SUV in order for it to fit in the vehicle. His clubs, shoes and golfballs, etc all fit comfortably. The strap inside the case pulled off during its first use which is pretty disappointing for a Samsonite product. It should be riveted to the case, not glued. I'll be interested to see how it holds up after further use.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisannethemum

customer_reviews.title: Broken Wheel and split plastic on its first Trip!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about the bag when it arrived. Packed it up. Used Ship Sticks to send it to Florida to arrive before me. HOWEVER, when it arrived at my hotel, one of the wheels was broken off... AND the side was split!! Not a at a seam the actual plastic was split!! Disappointing. Whose fault is it? Who knows... Sad!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wheels I’ve ever had, durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. Lots of room and protects your clubs very well. Has a strap inside to keep your bag from moving around inside. The wheels are the best? 6 wheels that are sturdy and do the wobble like every time you grab a shopping cart. Sturdy quality zippers as well. This THE travel bag to protect your investment.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! This case is beautiful. If it proves as durable as it is beautiful, I'll be very happy. So far, I've used it on a round trip, cross country flight. It held up great! The wheels are super and the case moves very easily, either upright or tilted. AS I said, so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great. Lacks durability.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product but I sent through TSA one time and it’s destroyed. Now I’m fairness, TSA are a bunch of mindless animals and they’ve broken clubs of mine on two occasions but still. One use and the whole bottom is blown out and now I just ha e a massive hole in the unit. It’s basically garbage now. Did I fill out a claim? Yes. But I shouldn’t have too. Thought this was higher quality than it is. Pretty cheaply made so that makes it about $100 over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for trade show booth!
customer_reviews.text: I had a soft canvas club carrier that I was using for a trade show booth. This thing is night and day easier to handle. If you travel to trade shows with a small folding/rolling exhibit, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It traveled well except that it is a little too ...
customer_reviews.text: It traveled well except that it is a little too long. Bag fits in with sufficient room, except you need a smallSUV or bigger rental car so that the travel case will fit in the car. I would not consider renting a sedan when rtravelling with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: F. L. APPEL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Eleven flights so far, and not even a ding. Perfect size — your clubs fit, with room for a couple of changes of clothes, but the extra padding of the clothes is erroneous. No damage on the 6 trips when I didn’t try to cheap out on the luggage fee More color options would be great. Blue and black means a bit of sorting at a busy baggage claim, but otherwise a stunningly protective bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful but wheels are too small!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful but wheels are too small! it does not roll well. I initially thought these were the new ones with wavy wheels, which are awesome. But I found out that these are the older model with tiny wheels. these wheels get stuck at everything. Totally dissatisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeong cho

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Cover Golf Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to be quick here about the things I liked and disliked about the bag. I wrote an in-depth review about the bag on DwayneTucker.com I also shared better photographs that we made. The bag is really durable, built well, and honestly a great golf travel bag. If you want to read more about what I have to say head over to the website. Hopefully that review and my detailed photographs are enough for you to purchase the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Keep warranty info handy
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke weeks after getting. Supposedly there's a 5-year warranty but I failed to record this information... Production Date PO/LOT# Material Group# Material Project# Vendor# Factory# I know other people who have bought this product and love it. For whatever reason mine cracked and zipper broke off. If you buy, just remember to keep all the information above handy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G Spanos

customer_reviews.title: one of The inside straps broke!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, but one of the inside straps that hold the golf bag in place broke. I've just returned from a trip & did not get the review posted in time for a return - but just a warning.....check the straps before you use this item
customer_reviews.author: H ranch

customer_reviews.title: This golf travel case is awesome. My husband loved it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This golf travel case is awesome. My husband loved it as a gift. We have not traveled with it yet but it seems like it will hold up to anything. I was worried because when traveling on a plane, the luggage movers aren't always so gentle. I wouldn't worry about my husbands golf clubs in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Traveled once with my clubs and they were ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Traveled once with my clubs and they were well protected. The hard shell gives me confidence to travel with my clubs and the zippers and straps seem sturdy enough. Do yourself a favor and spend some money on this versus the cheaper ones. If you're going to spend 3-5K on clubs, why not a few hundred to make sure they don't get damaged in transit.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Travels well, price is right - no problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. Used it twice - worked great. We have found that some airlines no longer allow soft cases. This Samsonite case is the right size to check as an extra bag and it has held up well. The fact that it has 4 wheels really helps when we are moving it. Price is right and with standard bag and club set - the total weight stays under 50 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea for the golfer that travels-flies
customer_reviews.text: Good gift idea for the golfer that travels-flies. Has extra room for clubs and shoes, etc. Very stylish. Zipper closure is better than cases with clasp locks that tend to break if you overpack the hard case. Buy the TSA lock that is available, gives extra security but also the red lock looks neat on the black background, and easier to spot your bag at pickup. This bag will stand upright and rolls easily. Was a great gift for my best friend who thought he had everything.
customer_reviews.author: john m.

customer_reviews.title: Large, inflexible
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it would be too difficult to fit into rental cars when traveling with other golfers. The soft side are more conformable
customer_reviews.author: Deb Standish

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on second use.
customer_reviews.text: I like this golf bag, its roomy. Plenty of room for shoes and extra clothes. However, on the second use a wheel got ripped off from the bag at the airport. I don't know if the bag is not built sturdy to withstand such handling or if the airport handlers are at fault.
customer_reviews.author: Carolhrtmn

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Case for Clubs
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this for himself to be able to travel with his clubs. They fit in there and the case is very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: it does scratch easily...
customer_reviews.text: The lock is TSA approved. One flight, the first light, it got scratched significantly (smh). There was some damaged to the lock but it remained ok.
customer_reviews.author: APEX III

customer_reviews.title: Very nice golf travel case.  Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This golf case is very well made. There is plenty of room inside for my clubs plus a few other things. No pockets inside, but I did not feel like they were necessary. The spinner wheels worked really well and pulling the cart on the two side wheels also worked well. I would recommend this bag. I wish I had bought it before buying the cloth BagBoy which was ripped twice by the airlines and finally distroyed.
customer_reviews.author: IHeartchocolate

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel! My golf clubs are well protected in this case! I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LaTresa Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great product for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Just like in the golf shop, but less money. Fit two sets of clubs in here with 2 lightweight carry bags.
customer_reviews.author: diane keenley

customer_reviews.title: Wheel corner cracked during first trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Ireland and when I go to fetch it from oversized luggage the corner around the wheel was already cracked after one trip (see pictures) Protects clubs and bag well (has room for extra balls/shoes too) but will be rendered useless when this crack turns into a full blown hole
customer_reviews.author: Alton Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Big but very maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for conference travel to hold banners, brochures etc. it was a bit taller than I expected, but even loaded with 50 lbs of materials, it moved smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha131

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clubs confined in a sturdy designed case
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 5 times now and it's gone through some rough handling. So far, it has held up extremely well. Glad I bought this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rod C. Wehrli

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been on two trips and it has help up well through airline travel
customer_reviews.author: Amazonwoman

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Rolls well Don't over pack or you will be charged extra heavy bag fee - made that mistake once. Southwest does not charge extra as it is not over sized.
customer_reviews.author: Golfmomma1

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through a few soft and hard sided golf cases before. Either they ripped or the wheels broke. Not the case with this case! It's lightweight but built to handle heavy golf equipment and was a breeze going through the airport. Hopefully, we have finally found a case that will last more than a handful of plane trips.
customer_reviews.author: nxtConcepts

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Golf Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: I'm not easily impressed, but this case did it for me. Sleek, lightweight and effecient. The case rolls right alongside you as you glide gracefully through the airport with the case closely up against your side. Meets my airline's specs for a sport bag with no extra charge, yet it sleekly carries a full set of golf clubs and shoes. Case looks good, performs great and its Samsonite so I know it will last. Delivery was fast. I'm pleased...and impressed
customer_reviews.author: Lanette

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the wheels and in m;any ways I like the zipper rather than the locks on others that I've had, but it's a little inconvenient to have to lay it down to put your clubs in as opposed to just opening it up and drop them in. Also it is a bit taller which makes it interesting if you rent a smaller model car. I have to rent a standard or full size car at least and then do a bit of maneuvering in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: ron holycross

customer_reviews.title: Broke on third use
customer_reviews.text: The side strap broke after the third use. My husband fixed it but I would not suggest buying and will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really durable shell!!
customer_reviews.text: I've shipped my golf clubs 3x so far and the shell is unphased as are the wheels and roller wheels. The zipper did come a bit undone but I unzipped and zipped back up and it appears to be good to go. I have a few more trips coming up and I anticipate no issues with this item. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this golf travel bag. No more twisting in the airport!
customer_reviews.author: SJarv

customer_reviews.title: ease of transport with spinner wheels
customer_reviews.text: Great for my smaller wife to handle her golf clubs through the airport. I will be buying one for my clubs as well Great product
customer_reviews.author: yellerdog

customer_reviews.title: the wheel got jammed right into the bag
customer_reviews.text: After only a few trips, one of the roller wheels got jammed right through the corner. I continued to use to for a while, but it was very disappointing that it could not withstand the airline baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Omaha Hog

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flimsy make and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the dimension on these before you purchase. They are huge. Next to impossible to fit into a car and you need a walk in closet or garage to store it. Pretty flimsy make and overpriced. Soft bags are better option. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but hard to handle
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice case and protects clubs much better than a soft bag. But, the bag is hard to handle and move around. It needs handles on both sides. Makes it harder to get in and out of the car. The bag is large which is great, but also hard to maneuver and fit in a normal car or taxi.
customer_reviews.author: Videophojo

customer_reviews.title: The Case too hard to manage, not enough handles and too long/tall!
customer_reviews.text: I like the 6 spin rolls, but the case is too long/big and not enough handles. Very hard to manage, I wanted to return, but I guess it is non-returnable.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for Long Putters!
customer_reviews.text: This case holds a larger bag AND a long putter. Rolls easily in the upright position you just push it. If you use a carry bag there is plenty of room for all your golf accessories. Only watch the wheels, this is our 2nd one (first one lasted several years and many trips) the baggage handler caught the wheel on a counter and pulled it out along with the corner of the case! We still like this case so we ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Golfsalot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel... The wheels allowed me to easily move through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Errol K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: a great travel case for your clubs
customer_reviews.text: Recently used the case on a trip to Arizona and my clubs were nicely protected by this case. It is large, like most hard cases, so getting it in a compact car was a little challenging, but it fit in the rear seat with the passenger seat pushed forward. Therefore, if more than one person is traveling with golf clubs, better get a car with large trunk. Case easily contains golf bag and large driver, can even hold bag with stand attached. The zippers make for easy closing, and were actually closed by the TSA personnel without incident, something that usually didn't occur with the case I used previously.
customer_reviews.author: WJS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag for the price. My golf bag and shoes fit and I have extra space for other luggage items.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Hays

customer_reviews.title: Too big, and fell apart in transit.
customer_reviews.text: I looked pretty sturdy when I received it, but the case fell apart when it came off the plane in Myrtle Beach. And it would not fit in the trunk or even the backseat of a full size sedan. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Eisma

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: THE CASE WAS USED TWICE, ZIPPER COMPLETELY BROKE..NOW OUT OF WARRANTY????
customer_reviews.author: D. madden

customer_reviews.title: Great Hard-sided Golf Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Works great just make sure you check your tag when picking up there are many that look identical to this one!
customer_reviews.author: W Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great golf travel case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father for his traveling golf trips. He reports he loved the case and it works as described. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great product - so far
customer_reviews.text: After buying, went on my first trip of the summer. Came through with flying colors. Rainy day at airport. Watched it sit out on the tarmac for 30 min. Got clubs, and it was as dry as can be. Buddy had soft case, everything in his bag was soaking wet. Would definitely recommend this, especially for the current amazon price. Traveling on my next golf trip soon. Will rewrite review if something changes
customer_reviews.author: R. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, Huge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking bag from the outside. Haven't used it yet. But it is huge. The dimensions listed on this bag are not accurate according to my measurements the bag from floor to the top of the handle is 60". We are going to try and use this to travel with next week, don't know what I am going to run into with paying oversized fees because this bag is now over the stated limit on the airplane. Will report once we get back from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Daja

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice product that protects clubs well. Traveled with it on international flights with no damage to clubs.Only negative is that is big and will not fit into a mid size car. However thje product works well and looks good. Received many compliments, even from airline staff
customer_reviews.author: Eben Burger

customer_reviews.title: Cracked first flight
customer_reviews.text: It's not like this bag is inexpensive, so when it cracked at the bottom after one flight I was shocked. One flight! Not to mention how easily the shell got scraped up. Defective. I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ciarrocchi

customer_reviews.title: Hard Case for travel is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Case is as advertised. It's a great hard case for flying. I was able to pack a carry bag, a pair of shoes, lots of clothes, and 2 dozen golf balls in the case while still keeping it under the 50lb limit. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hacker

customer_reviews.title: best travel case
customer_reviews.text: I have had two other golf bag cases in my life time and this one is the best. I am hoping i holds up well to the luggage people. I travel a lot and like to bring my clubs along when I can. This case makes it easy to pack and move around the airport and into the hotel. Only down size is that it is a little larger then other bags height wise. I like this for packing but rental cars struggle. Unless a flip down rear seat it will consume entire back seat.
customer_reviews.author: JFK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! One bag with my golf gear and my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: This have plenty of room. Next time I can travel with just this bag. I can put my clothes and toiletries in it. I just need to put my clothes on some organizer bags that I have already from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mely71212

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and they've been on two trips and are still in fabulous condition. Very glad we went with the hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin Life in NAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very durable - will have to wrap towels around the clubs so they don't bang together because there is a lot of room at top but a
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my fiance as a gift, he loves it!. Very durable - will have to wrap towels around the clubs so they don't bang together because there is a lot of room at top but all in all - works perfect. It rolls as well which is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: He ran into a snag yesterday when an Uber driver protested that the case was too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. His clubs made it safely to Florida this week. It's a big silver case with plush red lining. He ran into a snag yesterday when an Uber driver protested that the case was too big for the car -- somehow they fit the case in the car and made it to their destination.
customer_reviews.author: Cronan Minton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is for my son away at college, who likes to travel with his clubs! He’s happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Golf Bag Case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hardside golf travel case for my son for a trip he was taking to play golf. He said that it was EXTREMELY easy to maneuver this item. He was also quite pleased with how well his clubs traveled in it. Would DEFINATELY recommend this product to others. I also want to say that it shipped in amazing time. I believe it was delivered within 3 days of ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... bit clumsy to handle but it is hands down better than the soft carriers I have seen and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a bit clumsy to handle but it is hands down better than the soft carriers I have seen and I don't have to worry about clubs being bent when abused by baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Always Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: Have Clubs... Will travel
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out, robust design. Even though I've only used it on one trip, I expect it to have a decent life expectancy. In regards to the design, it is unexpectedly light weight, but more structurally sound when "zipped up". Also, ample room inside for your golf shoes, a few extra dozen golf balls for us shankers and other stuff. And best of all... Chicks dig it !
customer_reviews.author: chris stamatakos

customer_reviews.title: A great case for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The case performed as advertised. Very easy to navigate airport with the four wheels on the base. The zipper was easy to work, although I did put a TSA approved strap around it for extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Only recently used for the first time. Everything great so far. Only complaint was that this thing is pretty big - won't fit in a standard trunk. So you need an SUV.
customer_reviews.author: John Holland

customer_reviews.title: Hard sided!
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Made it through security with no question. My husband even stored a bottle of liquor he purchased on the trip inside of his golf bag and it was not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY...it is cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Used it ONE time and it broke near the wheels. This is the second one I have bought and the first one broke after 2 uses. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pull or push with the casters
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well and keeps my clubs safe. Easy to pull or push with the casters, so it was very easy to travel through the airport.
customer_reviews.author: LWild19

customer_reviews.title: Light, durable and LARGE
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews mention the size and yes, it fit into the rental car, but barely. On the other hand, no trouble fitting in all the clubs, shoes, towels, a few extra clothing items and still some room left over. Traveled across the country on its maiden voyage without so much as a scratch. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Top notch travel case
customer_reviews.text: As expected, well made. Zippers, handles, wheels, everything. The only downside is that when zipping the case closed, there is a rubber flange ( that I guess helps to make the case more water-proof) that is supposed to over the track that gets caught in the zipper. Not a huge deal, just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS C EMERSON

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: We used this golf case to transport film equipment. I love that it is easy to roll around and the size is great. The only con so far is that the rubber lining around the zipper area is starting to come undone. It looks like an easy fix with some strong glue but we have only had it for 2 months. I wouldn't have expected it to wear so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pond

customer_reviews.title: Not just for clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I don’t golf, but used it to travel with 4 beach chairs, 2 pop up tents, snorkel gear and my portable Keurig machine! Saves money on renting chairs and umbrellas at beach resorts!
customer_reviews.author: SIR John

customer_reviews.title: If there were ever a set of wheels you wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: If there were ever a set of wheels you wanted on something that made it go as smoothly as this I'd say GET IT! Very roomy for additional items also. Finally found a Golf case my husband LOVES too!
customer_reviews.author: GINA

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before an impromptu trip to the DR. It held up really well for being bounced around at the airports. Husband was happy with it and plans to continue to use it on the next golf adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: the zipper is not working after traveling 2 times . This is a very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: This case has provided the most of my need when traveling on my golf trips. Very spacious and easy to move around. The quad base wheels makes it even better yet by just pushing it to the direction you need it to go to. It seems that can almost operate on its own. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS GALDAMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and protects the clubs very well. This bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and protects the clubs very well. This bag has straps inside to strap down your clubs and is lightly padded towards the top. Cut a broom stick slightly larger than your driver and keep it in your bag when traveling. Cons: Top handle rubs against your hand a little when dragging the case. Not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard cover is best
customer_reviews.text: Husband has one for over a year traveling so got one for son. Tried a soft bag first, destroyed in three trips, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl nielsen

customer_reviews.title: haven't traveled with it yet so will gave to update later but it feels sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves this case and so do I. Based on look and feel alone, haven't traveled with it yet so will gave to update later but it feels sturdy.... Guess we will see. Ha fakes nicely from our limited experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Oriana

customer_reviews.title: Little heavier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for clubs. A little bulky to store in rental car suv back. Had to lay down rear seat. So if foursome is traveling will need van or xtra large suv
customer_reviews.author: Five Putt

customer_reviews.title: ok for mild travel
customer_reviews.text: I need something to transport my clubs when flying. The outside case quality is good. The straps inside that hold the bag in place broke on the first flight I took. I have to re-stitch them on with heavy duty stitching. Otherwise it rolls easy and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid case
customer_reviews.text: It's long and is tough to get in a regular sized car trunk
customer_reviews.author: T. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: handles and zippers are still good shape. The 6 wheel idea is interesting
customer_reviews.text: One flight with it. A few scuffs, but the clubs are safe. All the wheels, handles and zippers are still good shape. The 6 wheel idea is interesting, but works fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as promised. We have flown with it several times and the clubs are well-protected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. Have taken on several airline trips and so far so good. Clubs fit well inside with plenty of room for other things (yoga mat) when you go on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

product_meta.title: Samsonite Golf Hard Sided Travel Cover Case
product_meta.description:
Travel the world worry-free with the Samsonite Hard-Sided Golf Travel Case. This lightweight hard-sided travel case boasts a durable, solid ABS Shell which shields your golf bag and clubs from the wear-and-tear of air travel. Measuring 54" L x 12" H x 16" W, this travel case can accommodate larger 10.5" top golf bags with longer, 48" clubs. The hard-sided travel case features a padded quilted interior with extra foam cushioning on top to protect club heads and the internal compression straps secure the golf bag. Designed to make travel a breeze with 4 multi-directional spinner wheels and 2 in-line skate wheels, allowing the case to be pushed or pulled.

AMAZON.COM
The Samsonite Golf Travel Cover is made of Denier polyester and designed to hold clubs up to 46 inches long and accommodate a 10.5 inch wide golf bag. The cover has a well-padded, ergonomically designed, detachable shoulder strap for ease of transport and rolls on sealed ball bearing in-line skate wheels. The top and sides of the cover's interior are quilted with extra padding to protect the shafts and clubheads from damage, and its exterior is equipped with rubber reinforced top, bottom, and side handles for easy lifting. A shoe bag attaches and detaches from the cover by zipper and features a plastic identification card window.

 Manufacturer's Warranty
Samsonite five-year limited warranty
feature_bullets: The lightweight and durable solid ABS Shell shields your golf bag and clubs from the wear and tear of air travel
Features a padded quilted interior with extra foam cushioning on top to protect club heads
4 multi-directional spinner wheels and 2 in-line skate wheels allows the case to be pushed or pulled
Internal compression straps secure the golf bag inside the case
Accommodates larger 10.5" top golf bags with longer, 48" clubs
